author: Becky G
title: Exceeded our expectations
text:
My husband and I stayed here for one night and were very impressed by virtually all aspects of this hotel - primarily its superb location. We were attending a concert at the Royal Albert Hall, which is a mere five minute walk away. The wonderful V&A, Natural History and Science Museums are all very close by.
Our room was large and well-equipped - the gigantic bed was very comfortable; the bed linen and towels were high quality. The bathroom was cavernous with large twin basins and a good powerful shower (that did not leak a drop - a rarity with showers!).
We found everything to be spotlessly clean - there were a few minor areas of cosmetic damage/scuffing, but nothing that affected the comfort of our stay in any way. We enjoyed a peaceful and restful night's sleep.
Breakfast was just right; my husband rated the sausages highly. Everything was in good supply, well displayed and delicious - it really set us up for the day.
Every member of staff we encountered was very friendly, welcoming and courteous - they are all a real asset to the hotel. Check in and check out could not have been simpler and we were delighted to be able to use the luggage room facility - completely free of charge, which meant that we could spend the whole day after checking out unencumbered by our cases.
We would definitely return to the Queen's Gate Hotel - I have already recommended it to several friends.
